metadata.name: MutantApeWife #1
metadata.description: Heed our words of warning for they may be the last you will ever need. An oozing sickness has begun seeping into the metaverse. It is a vicious virus that has infected the race of ApeWives. The mutating mildew has modified the once easily recognizable and relatively peaceful Apes into a whole new species. Appropriately named, the Mutant ApeWives grow nearer by the hour. Our best have recorded a force of 10,000 ApeWives in all their gruesome complexion. There is no doubt the impact Mutant ApeWives will have will be vast and memorable. The future of the metaverse is at stake and in your hands. You know what you must do, the question is are you brave enough to do it?
